title: pecan caramel truffles
directions: combine sugar and water in small pot over stir until uniform heat and stir until sugar is dissolved
let mixture simmer until it turnns golden
remove from heat and quickly add butter and salt
add mascarpone and stir until uniform
clean pot and lightly butter a heatproof plate
combine condensed milk and cocoa powder in pot and whisk until uniform
add salt and butter and heat over medium to low heat whisking constantly until mixture comes to a boil
let boil for 2-3 minutes or untiil mixture is as thick as chocolate pudding
scrape onto prepared plate and let cool
chill caramel for 30 minutes or until it is firm enough to scoop and roll into 1/2 tsp balls
keep in fridge until ready to assemble
use a small spoon to scoop about 2 tsp of chocolate mixture, press caramel into middle and roll into a ball
drop balls into pecans and roll to coat
store in fridge on waxed paper
ingredients: 1/4 cup unsalted butter cut into pieces
2 Tbsp unsalted butter cut into pieces plus extra for buttering
